mapper.sql: id, studentid, crn, grade, complete, assigntime
mapper.delete: delete from Transcript where studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into Transcript
id,
studentid,
crn,
grade,
complete,
assigntime,
operator,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update Transcript
studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete = #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigntime = #{assigntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from Transcript where crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) as count from Transcript where crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and complete = #{complete, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM Course c WHERE c.crn IN (SELECT t.crn FROM Transcript t WHERE t.studentid = #{arg0,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM TranscriptView WHERE studentid = #{arg0, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM TranscriptView WHERE crn = #{arg0, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from Transcript
and ( studentid like '%' #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' or crn like '%' #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' or coursename like '%' #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' or faculyid like '%' #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%')
